amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement, administer, or enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A043) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 240 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: King (IA) amendment (A043) modified by unanimous consent. After the words "this Act" insert "or Divisions A, C, D, F, or G".
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A043) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 240 (Roll no. 464).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. King (IA).
